post.title: moto droid (1) update to froyo 2.2
post.content: for those of you that have received it, what do you think of it? i dont have it yet. i was told by a verizon rep when i got my phone replaced that it is in circulation now being sent to 10,000 phones at a time. and i should expect it sometime soon. seems to be all good and information on their site sounds good, too bad it doesnt let u update manually. just trying to find out the goods n bads of froyo, if there are any of course. thanks!
